extendedInfo.description: Do you love the Geordie lingo? Want Newcastle born words of wisdom in your pocket? Now you can! The Geordie Sounds app features some of the best quotes from famous Geordies on TV (including those from MTV's hit show Geordie Shore) In true Newcastle style, the app is themed black and white to really get you into the Geordie spirit.Features: - Great Geordie quotes.- The opportunity to submit your own sounds.- Set the sounds within the application as your notification sound.- Hilarious translations.Coming soon: - More sound clips.- The 'Geordie Test'.We want to hear from you!There's still a lot more we can add to this app, so tell us what you want! What would you like to see? What sound clips do you want? What added features would work for you? All suggestions will be considered, with the most popular ones being put into practice. Please use the website to provide your suggestions (thecreighton.wordpress.com), please don't rate the application negatively if it's missing some features that you want! Make a suggestion, if it's popular, it'll be implemented. Disclaimer: All quotes and sound clips are famous quotes from various Geordies. Any quotes featured are intended to promote the shows in which they have been famously heard on, or to simply promote the sense of humour that Geordie's have! All recordings were done solely for this app.Please Note: The material featured in this app is suitable for those aged 15+ (hence the high maturity rating).

reviews.title: Great app but needs to be a little louder!
reviews.comment: As much as your voice is very lovely in this app, (you actually hand your number out with it so people can get in contact with you and take you out), you really need to make the sounds have a louder volume so that when set as a notification they can be heard when the volume is on full. Also get a bit of Ricci and Rebecca in there.  Besides that a brilliant app that everyone should try out!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Funny app, the sound quality has got better!

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: I downloaded it to see if it would sound like the phrases they say on Geordie Shore but it is not! The person speaking is a man with a shocking Geordie accent so I presume he isn\'t from Newcastle and secondly anybody/everybody says, \'hmm\' & guys say \'how to pull\' so they aren\'t Geordie phrases! I am truly disappointed that this app wasn\'t worth a higher star rating but to be honest, I dont think it deserves a 1 star!!!!?
reviews.author: LIZZIELEACH X

reviews.title: amazing! However...
reviews.comment: One thing that would make it the best app around would be to put all episodes of Geordie Shore on here. Im new to watching the series and am finding it hard to follow as ive not watched it that many times. Would be great to have an app in which we could know all the latest Goss as well as watch missed episodes of the show! :-)
